scripture.RevMessage: I am coming soon, hold fast what you have, so that no one may seize your crown.

scripture.ZachMessage: Not by might nor by power, but by my Spirit says the Lord of hosts.

scripture.JerMessage: Will a man leave the snow waters of Lebanon?  Do the mountian waters run dry the cold flowing streams.

scripture.ProvMessage: Let not mercy and kindness and truth leave you.
